mapper.select: select count, date from (SELECT count(id) as 'count', DATE(create_time) as date FROM `b_article` where DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{lastTime} and #{nowTime} GROUP BY DATE(create_time)) AS blog ORDER BY blog.date ASC
select a.id, a.title, a.summary, a.is_stick, a.create_time from b_article a where LOWER(a.title) like concat('%', #{keywords}, '%') and a.is_publish = 1 order by a.create_time desc

select a.id, a.title, a.avatar,a.summary,a.quantity,a.is_stick,a.is_original,a.user_id,c.id as categoryId,c.name as categoryName, a.create_time, u.nickname,u.avatar as userAvatar,a.user_id from b_article a left join b_category c on a.category_id = c.id left join b_user u on a.user_id = u.id where a.is_publish = 1
and a.category_id = #{categoryId}
and a.id in (select article_id from b_article_tag where tag_id =#{tagId})
order by a.is_stick desc,
a.${orderByDescColumn} desc
a.create_time desc

select a.id, a.user_id, u.avatar, u.nickname, a.title, a.summary, a.content, a.content_md, a.quantity, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.read_type, a.is_original, a.original_url, a.is_publish, a.keywords, a.address, c.id as cid, c.name as cname from b_article a left join b_category c on a.category_id = c.id left join b_user u on a.user_id = u.id where a.id = #{id}
select id, title, avatar from b_article where is_carousel = 1 and is_publish = 1 order by is_stick desc ,create_time desc
select id, title, avatar,create_time from b_article where is_recommend = 1 order by create_time desc limit 5
select id, title from b_article where is_publish = 1 order by quantity desc limit 5
